categories: Category:Sith of the New Sith Wars

nodes.text: A male Sith warrior fought for the Sith during the New Sith Wars, and was bonded to the Sith battlelord Farh j'Hien via the Force. The warrior eventually defected from the Sith and became beset with pain as a result, due to his Force bond to j'Hien. Eventually, the warrior was captured by the Jedi Master Kei Loo Bross, and the warrior asked Bross to make his pain go away. Bross recorded an account of his encounter with the warrior, and the record was later included in the publication Speculations on Tactics of the Sith.
